metadata.title: CVE-2017-9229 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Oniguruma 6.2.0, as used in Oniguruma-mod inRuby through 2.4.1 and mbstring in PHP through 7.1.5. A SIGSEGV occurs inleft_adjust_char_head() during regular expression compilation. Invalidhandling of reg->dmax in forward_search_range() could result in an invalidpointer dereference, normally as an immediate denial-of-service condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9229` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libonig4 - 6.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libonig package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.3.0-1').
